website_summaries.verdict: Choose these seeds if you want a fun and colorful way to attract pretty critters to your flower garden, but the results are known to be inconsistent if conditions aren't ideal.
pros: A collection of 500 seeds that sprout more than 20 varieties of wildflowers known to attract butterflies and hummingbirds
Full of bold colors when in full bloom
cons: Germination rate may be less than indicated by the company
Difficult to grow in some conditions, such as too hot, wet, or dry

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m not a gardener but thought I’d take a shot this year. Everything came in beautifully with not a lot of work. I’ll be buying more next year.
customer_reviews.author: TP89

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase - I spread these seeds midwinter ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase - I spread these seeds midwinter in a small bed in the garden, and they're extremely vibrant and bring a lot of life to the section where I planted them. Update - still very happy with these seeds. We got new wildflower blooms this year (after an unexpected and heavy snow) that didn't show up last year, and are thoroughly enjoying it still.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. H. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I got almost complete germination and good growth
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a gardener, I am more lucky than knowledgeable. I planted these seeds in my flower planter as directed (DO read the directions & follow) I saw where some folks were not getting much germination, so I put the whole package into the dirt and seems most came up within 2 weeks. Well, then we got the week long monsoon down here in Florida and every 2 inch sprout is now 4 inches lol. It's nature :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen SoFla

customer_reviews.title: So I ordered two more packs of seeds because I have had such great success with the first
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in late May, and planted them with in the week I bought them. I followed the instructions. With in the week they began to sprout. Unfortunately my chickens ate a lot of the sprouts. So I ordered two more packs of seeds because I have had such great success with the first. I live in zone 4-5 and they are doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Shopicorn

customer_reviews.title: Love having the Hummingbirds come into my yard
customer_reviews.text: Love having the Hummingbirds come into my yard. They are so beautiful, and they seem to enjoy having this there for them.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. O'brien

customer_reviews.title: Spring has sprung!!
customer_reviews.text: I just Followed the instructions included with the seeds and less than 10 days later I have lovely starter plants.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Very good seeds.
customer_reviews.text: Sprouted beautifully for me. Still waiting on the flower part to come in but the seeds work fine. Hope I didn’t add too many for this pot. Update: Slowly blooming one by one!! All are so fun to watch become lovely flowers!!! Not sure why folks are saying these seeds don’t sprout. They’re really good seeds. Be sure you don’t have extremely crappy soil with no nutrients and make you water! All living things need sustenance.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: Home based and not customer friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a home based facility per a message I just received from them. In my opinion from a message received from them they are not customer friendly! God forbid a customer having a question or concern about their product not germination. I would not recommend using them and will not use them ever again myself
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Floirda
customer_reviews.text: Just basically threw on the ground, kick around and 3 months later i have 2 to 3 foot tall wildflowers. I would suggest using bamboo or something for the longer ones so they don't fall down
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my elderly father to plant in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my elderly father to plant in a waist high planter. They grew even though planted in August and have given him a lot of pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: dag

customer_reviews.title: What a joke.
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. A little tiny envelope of seeds. Approximately $7.00 for a 100 sqft, (10' X 10' area). I bought these and waited for them because of the COVID-19. I'm going to sow these seeds in the trash. I went to XXXX'X and bought the hummingbird/butterfly seed mix that I always use with success for the same price which covers 10,000 sqft.
customer_reviews.author: karen lynn

customer_reviews.title: Planted Minutes Ago - Reporting Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: 500 sure feels like a lot, but when it comes down to it, this felt disappointing to sow. I had a tiny area about 1' x 1' that I planned to put some seeds - it's a good thing I grabbed this packet because that's about all that fit there. When I plant wildflowers, I like to shake them out and be whimsical about it. Hope to get a few blooms that pop before the first frost of fall. I don't think I'll get much, and would have rather just bought some wildflowers at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: K Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy these again
customer_reviews.text: They all grew, had many colors and different heights, saw butterfly and honeybees. Overall, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Super excited!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant to try and grow anything from seeds but in the end I'm glad I did it. I used the tupperware and wet paper towel method and within a few days some seeds were sprouting! The hard part was clearing out the weeds from the area I wanted to plant them in. From tupperware to dirt they went and its been a week since I sprinkled them in and their little sprouts are popping in all over the place! I'm looking forward to seeing how beautiful they all become.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my patio garden and planted them indoors in June...I know you're supposed to do it in the fall but anyway...I started them under a gro lite inside and once they got established I moved them outside. They grow quickly and in the three months since planting, they have five blooms!! I don't know if you're supposed to grow them in containers but I'm so excited and the hummingbirds have already visited. Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: hshopper

customer_reviews.title: good seeds
customer_reviews.text: beautiful flowers did come up, but not all the types listed. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: ssggbroot

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Beautiful Flowers
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 2nd pack. I love my pack of seeds. Planted in several pots and had great success. Tomorrow is October 1st and still I have blooms. No complaints. Super easy for me. Filled the pot with soil, used my screw driver dropped the seeds and watered them. I got many pretty flowers. Plant snap identifies it as a Gerber daisy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: I planted these a month ago and they have grown ...
customer_reviews.text: I planted these a month ago and they have grown really tall but I do hope they start to bloom soon I can't wait for my garden to come to life
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana and Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No flowers in this bunch
customer_reviews.text: If I wanted basil I got a lot of basil from the seed packet! I do use it. I was expecting flowers. Nope. Bunch of green starters of mystery plants. One grew so big I still can’t figure out what it is! Waiting for flower. I will be straight up, I don’t have a garden except for pots on my balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Intuit

customer_reviews.title: Looking good so far, arrived weeks late 😔
customer_reviews.text: These arrived weeks late but I planted them as soon as they arrived. They arrived on August 12 and I planted them that same night. They are already starting to sprout as of this post. I did not give it more stars because I want to be able to comment on the flowers if/when they bloom.
customer_reviews.author: Calcifer Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Seeds coming up. Spring will tell.
customer_reviews.text: I won't know until spring whether they were worth five stars, but I gave them that because I scattered the seeds as directed and there's a nice patch of green coming up already. That is enough to fill every gardener with hope or we wouldn't plant anything. You gotta believe.
customer_reviews.author: Ursa Logica

customer_reviews.title: Not enough seeds for the price
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to this product’s growing capacity as I haven’t planted yet... however, I expected more seeds for $8+. This is just slightly bigger than the Burpee seed packets you get at Home Depot or garden centers. I thought this was going to be like A BAG of seeds. You get a measly 500 seeds per packet. It really worth the money, in my opinion, especially not knowing the gamble of how many seeds will actually germinate.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Nothing germinated. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing. Not a single flower germinated in good fertile soil. Not in full-sun, half-shade, or full-shade. this was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ErikS

customer_reviews.title: Grass seeds.... no flowers
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad to report this was mostly grass seeds. I bought 3 packets and placed them in new potting soil in full sun exposure. The sprouts came up instantly and I was so excited.... however it was all grass seeds... no flowers.... all the packets the same. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Will buy a third time
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year with this mix. Germinates very well! Seems like they make each seed bag individually because it is fairly consistent with the plants coming up this year compared to last year. Looking forward to doing it again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Louise

customer_reviews.title: Wildflower , Butterfly , Hummingbird Mix
customer_reviews.text: I received the seeds within 6 days. As you can see there are a lot of seeds in the bag. I cant wait to plant them and watch them grow. I also ordered Zinnia's from David's . I planted those and within 3 days they started to sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: maybe i don't have a green thumb, but i ...
customer_reviews.text: maybe i don't have a green thumb, but i planted these and nothing grew. I was attentive and gave them plenty of water and sun.
customer_reviews.author: halie

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this
customer_reviews.text: These were planted after the Sunflower seeds had sprouted, this allowed for awesome color as the sunflowers grew up above them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Koll

customer_reviews.title: Not very many flowers
customer_reviews.text: I planted these seeds in 2 flower boxes. The one completely died and the other not mature very good. I had a few weeds and also had a tomato plant. Disappointed in these. Really wanted for these to survive.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Sewell

customer_reviews.title: flower seed
customer_reviews.text: came up, had some flowers, we have hummingbirds but did not see one have any interest in these flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: got a couple of butterflies was so happy. so we are really hoping we get more ...
customer_reviews.text: got these fast, planted them last year, got a couple of butterflies was so happy. so we are really hoping we get more this year.
customer_reviews.author: shaw22

customer_reviews.title: Did not germinate
customer_reviews.text: None of my flowers germinate. I use different methods and no results.
customer_reviews.author: My comfort zone

customer_reviews.title: Very rewarding
customer_reviews.text: These seeds yielded endless varieties of blooms to my garden. Very fun to see what will bloom next! Lots of butterflies, hummingbirds and bees as promised. Couldnt be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: These take a while but they finally are growing
customer_reviews.text: Lots of rain, sun and the soil is well taken care of. Big disappointment and my bag was around half what the picture shows, what seemed like broken seeds didn't even seem to add up to 500. Edit: I updated my rating as these seeds have begun growing (though I'm not sure on the 80% guarantee) and they look quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a single flower. Not one! Might as well of planted marbles. Followed the instructions and nothing. Grrrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Trooper T

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a bag of flower seeds as advertised. None of them germinated in my case though. Not one. Could have been the conditions; could have been the seeds. Can't know for sure. Good luck on your gamble. That's the way it goes with seeds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Packet but Little Success
customer_reviews.text: I cleared rocks, grass & weeds from a 4 x 8 sunny spot. I mixed in 2 bags of top soil, even though the soil seemed good. (I had seen plenty of worms, when weeding.) I followed the packet directions exactly. Despite sun and water, only 2 or 3 wildflowers have started to grow. Ir's been a month. The packet looked great. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good crop!
customer_reviews.text: I got the seats for a family garden out in Pennsylvania, and they all sprouted quickly and are doing well! Make sure and water well when they're first coming up.
customer_reviews.author: LauraB

customer_reviews.title: very low germination rate
customer_reviews.text: I planted multiple beds in my garden with seed mixes from different sellers. This one had very few plants sprout and only one species. I followed the directions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Typical low price RIP-OFF. You get a tiny amount of annual seeds.
customer_reviews.text: this is a tiny package. unless youre planting a very small window pot it just wont be enough seeds!! further these are not perrinnel seds as decribed. This is the typical 'low price RIPOFF.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: The display is beautiful I am still waiting for butterflies to show up ...
customer_reviews.text: I built a 4 by 8 foot raised bed but I should have built a larger bed. Also, where the bed was placed did not give enough sunlight. The display is beautiful I am still waiting for butterflies to show up in large numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry DeBert

customer_reviews.title: positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days of planting the seeds I have so much sprouted out!!! The reason I bought David's seed because of the Positive reviews, and for my garden needs 🐝 and 🦋 Mahalo David🤙🏼
customer_reviews.author: Tomhirner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had one seed sprout. No flower yet, but it's been a while. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eej

customer_reviews.title: Well, I'm not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Planted two months ago. I was excited when I started seeing sprouts, but this is all that came up.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the seeds I received. I did not get the bounty that was described nor the flowers indicated on the description. I cannot recommend this product nor would I buy it again. I would have fared better had I gone to the nursery and purchased a plant instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Garel

customer_reviews.title: Attract wonderful garden creatures.
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? What a wonderful mix of butterfly/hummingbird attracting seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Baynak

customer_reviews.title: Flowers seeds
customer_reviews.text: It will be wonderful if they grow its a little bit early yet but the trees think it's spring
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, and are already growing after only ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and are already growing after only being planted less than a week. I can't wait to see how big they get.
customer_reviews.author: kalyn c

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Promptly and Sprouting Well
customer_reviews.text: Virtually all seeds have sprouted and are growing well. David's shipped the seeds promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great seed mixture. Built a border of flower mixes around my garden. Hummers & butterflies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Different color beautiful flowers
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice surprise when the plants grow the it shows different color very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Haval Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Give it some time
customer_reviews.text: I think maybe if I plant them and they grow would be the opportune time to give you a review I just got them they asking a little bit too quick
customer_reviews.author: bruce r coolbeth sr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! All my seeds sprout . I had to sacrifice some out of lack of space 😕
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Flower seeds into lovely flowers
customer_reviews.text: Received as ordered Wildflowers grew beautifully all summer. Very happy I purchased these seeds! Highly reseller

customer_reviews.title: No flowers bloomed!
customer_reviews.text: We followed all the directions and no flowers bloomed at all, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Planting time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered thinking to plant this year, package stated past time to plant
customer_reviews.author: Jack Foy

customer_reviews.title: Great germination rate beautiful flowers
customer_reviews.text: This was third year i planted a bed with David’s seeds for humming birds and butterfly. The seeds are wonderful and a dependable company to order from.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Makes gardening a little easier for us older folks.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Campisi

customer_reviews.title: flowerless garden
customer_reviews.text: I only got one specie and I didn't see very many others as pictured in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The hummingbirds are not pleased and I do not blame them
customer_reviews.text: Not a hummingbird in sight because not a single seed germinated. The hummingbirds are not pleased and I do not blame them.
customer_reviews.author: LwrKfla

customer_reviews.title: Bag seed
customer_reviews.text: I planted these as wild flower seeds and got noxious weeds that I now have to not only cut off, but burn the area they are planted in! Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Freidline

customer_reviews.title: Lots of plants, but all the same!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely had a large number of plants grow, but only one kind of flower grew and bloomed. One kind. There was no variety, so that was a disappointment. There was a variety of seeds in the bag, so I'm not sure what happened there. I will try to thin them out for next year and get a little more specific with which plants I put in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian M

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any wildflowers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is the hopes of getting a bunch of different wildflowers. Unfortunately, all it grew was a garden full of Basil and 3 actual flowers. Very disappointed because I now have enough Basil for friends, family and neighbors and no pretty flowers! The tall stems in the back are Sunflowers that I planted separately.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds, easy to grow
customer_reviews.text: Growing them are super easy! I didn’t do any prepare work, put the seeds on top of some normal soil, then with a thin layer of soil on top, water frequently. Already see a lot of them growing out after a few days!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Southern flowers
customer_reviews.text: If you live in a warm climate, then sure this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hardcore

customer_reviews.title: Weather hit
customer_reviews.text: The weather here has been 100 + they plants are struggling but still growing.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Flowers wild seeds
customer_reviews.text: Your good but I never really thought they grew I did plant them and the price is good

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Brought out lots of butterflies & a couple of humming birds
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE L. OSWALT

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The humming birds and bees loved these flowers. They grew so beautifully here until the summer heat in Az got to them.

customer_reviews.title: Alot of seeds and deliver in a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: Received in a few days. Looks Easy to grow. Alot of seeds.

customer_reviews.title: Plant in season
customer_reviews.text: Might be my fault. Planted late in the season. Not a lot of blooms. Would try again next spring.

customer_reviews.text: This was not a good choice for because they did not flower. I planted them in early May.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, lots of blooms
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I had a very nice spread of wildflowers that had many many different colors. Even my husband was impressed.

customer_reviews.title: These are the most variety and beautiful flowers ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got these , I immediately planted them. They grew so fast wonderfull wonderful seeds!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed yet

customer_reviews.title: Happy gardener in SE Michigan.
customer_reviews.text: Hundreds of happy, healthy seedlings in SE Michigan. Sunny spot. Watered twice a day for first two weeks to germinate.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: but was very disappointed. No way were there "500" seeds as said ...
customer_reviews.text: Tiny amount of seeds. I thought for $6.95 I would receive a reasonable amount of seed, but was very disappointed. No way were there "500" seeds as said in the description.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of birds and hummingbirds they love me and i respect them....cant wait for these

customer_reviews.text: my flowers actually grew! This is my second order and hope that these seeds will also!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flowers
customer_reviews.text: I am consistently getting beautiful flowers from my garden with this seeds pack. However it would be great if I comes with more information...(flower names and shapes of sprout). At the beginning, I couldn't tell which one is weed and which one is not.... I had to search a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I like the way to spread the seeds and that they are all together. Makes it easy on the human.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I placed the seeds in cloth pots with excellent drainage and great sunlight. Saw about 3-4 of the species seen on the package of seeds.

customer_reviews.title: looking good. we have had a lot of rain here ...
customer_reviews.text: they are coming up! looking good. we have had a lot of rain here in Hawaii so when it warms up a bit they will bloom. looking forward to the blooms and butterflies.

customer_reviews.title: No wild flowers for me.

customer_reviews.title: No flowers...

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to see what grows
customer_reviews.text: I planted these about 10 days ago, and there are lots of sprouted plants! Can’t wait to see what grows and blossoms!

product_meta.title: David's Garden Seeds Wildflower Butterfly Hummingbird Mix SL9863 (Multi) 500 Non-GMO, Open Pollinated Seeds
product_meta.description: Butterflies and hummingbirds add color, active movement and beauty to any home garden. This gourmet blend of blooms will provide you with many hours of intrigue and enjoyment by enticing our iridescent flying friends. Requires 6-8 hours of direct sunlight per day, soil temps of 70 degrees plus. Does best when planted in fall for spring growth. Daytime temps around 75 to 80 plus and nights no cooler than 65. David's Garden Seeds is a Veteran owned business that has been selling quality products since 2009. Wildflower seeds perform best when sown in the fall for spring growing. Comprised of the following: Purple Coneflower... P... Tickseed... P... Cornflower... A Rocket Larkspur... A Blanketflower... P Indian Blanket... A Drummond Phlox... A Scarlet Sage... A/P... 5.29% Candytuft... A/P... 4.96% Yellow Cosmos... A... 4.96% Sweet William... A/P... 4.74% Cosmos... A... 4.52% Wallflower... P/B... 3.41% Lemon Mint... A/P... 3.30% Tuber Vervain... P... 2.86% Standing Cypress... P... 2.62% Black-Eyed Susan... A/P... 2.09% Shasta Daisy... P... 2.06% Plains Coreopsis... A... 1.87% Butterfly Weed... P... 1.76% Sweet Alyssum... A... 1.54% Spurred Snapdragon... A... .88%
feature_bullets: Seeds are Non-GMO, easy to grow and hand packed by David's Garden Seeds in the United States of America
This gourmet blend of blooms will provide you with many hours of intrigue and enjoyment by enticing
Great combination of colors--one packet will cover ten square feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars880 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
